resources.string: Sorry, you can play videos only from %1$s to %2$s.
Sorry, you exceeded the allowed session watching period. you can watch videos again in %1$d minutes.
Sorry, you exceeded the allowed daily watching period.

Kids can view videos only in specified periods controlled by daily start and end times as well as within a maximum daily\\session viewing periods. When a session period elapses, session viewing resets after the specified time.
Note: Changing Viewing Period settings will reset current viewing progress.
